abstract: California's San Joaquin Valley is home to tremendous agricultural boom, now harvesting 92 percent of United States' mandarin oranges; growth of crop, which has been turned into star product, has been driven by marketing, American demand for easy to peel and eat fruit and careful planting and experimentation by farmers.

headline.print_headline: Rising Stars of the Fruit Bowl
headline.main: Mandarin Oranges, Rising Stars of the Fruit Bowl

snippet: As sales boom, here’s help in finding the best of the fruit popularly known as tangerines.
lead_paragraph: As sales boom, here’s help in finding the best of the fruit popularly known as tangerines.
